Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Curral de Pedras. Grassland with scattered bushes. Male vocalizing with song and calls as it moved about in trees around abandoned farm buildings. It was joined by a female which also gave a few calls. Light rain throughout.
